prompts: Create a giant, friendly Pokemon that loves to sleep and eat berries.
Imagine a cuddly, round Pokemon with a big belly lounging under a tree.
Design a laid-back Pokemon that enjoys napping in sunny fields.
Generate a sleepy creature surrounded by a pile of delicious fruits.
Show me a massive, drowsy Pokemon that blocks paths while snoozing.
Make a gentle giant Pokemon with soft fur and a love for food.
Give me a robust, sleepy Pokemon that rolls when it gets up.

distinctive_features: Belly that appears to be full
